dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: Have you decided to leave, my foolish companion?
They were words not meant to persuade me, but merely to pounce at me...
Although they did not hurt, they may have left a mark.

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: You have nowhere to return to, and you're dragging that tottering body along?

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: Do you truly believe you will find a place to call home, wherever you might go?

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: Enjoy your rest, then.

dataList.title: N Corp.
dataList.content: I'll return once twilight arrives.
With that, I parted from Gubo, who was my last remaining compatriot.
I was thoroughly isolated.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: That's right. With this, we all ended up alone.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Only then...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: At long last.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: My turn had come.
...This is the part where Mr. Dongrang hands the glass technology over to K Corp.
We were in the League's shoes if only for a short while, so we know what's been going on.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: ...But I must say it's a bit disheartening to hear you call them children's playthings.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You won't be saying that once you learn that animals feel pain exactly like we do.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Dongrang, don't make clumsy attempts unless you're planning to save everyone in the City.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: If I thought this measly technology had what it takes to give every single person the help they needed, I would've given my all for it.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: But... you think that'll change anything? The world will still be a terrible mess.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: It was perfectly fine to be hurt. I didn't have to strain my body and heart trying to cure things. I was so stupid, wasn't I?

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Then you should've braced for it! Have the guts to bite your tongue and die if you couldn't stand to survive alone in the hometown!
Yup, looks like Dongrang's...

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Why the surprise? You must have heard stories about our Wing's Singularity.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: ...Looking at it in person felt different is all. I didn't think I would come all the way here...

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Yeah, most have similar reactions. So... can you remind me of what you can do?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah, to start with an explanation of the technology I invented...

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: My expectations are particularly high since I heard you were a member of the League of Nine. That... Young-ji person is still missing, is that right?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: ...Yes, he is.

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Well, it's a shame about the League disbanding... But it's fortunate we managed to recruit one of them.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: The League of Nine... always serves as a plentiful shade, doesn't it. Then and now...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: By the way, this reminds me of a thing that would cry at me like this in the past...

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Dongrang?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Oh... I mean, the reason I've come here is...
The thing that used to cry at Dongrang...
He must mean the yellow calf...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Haha. What are you doing now?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: The League of Nine has disbanded, and the play is over. You're not Yurang anymore.
You're right, I guess I got too immersed and felt like I was one of your "companions" for a second.
You said you fulfilled your wish, but it didn't seem that way to me no matter which way I looked at it.
Did you feel the same when you saved that calf?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Will you watch your words? I didn't save the calf expecting a reward.
You think we don't know that? You saved the poor creature right before it got crushed to death 'cause you felt like it. I remember when we took turns feeding it milk.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I believed that it would be okay to save lives without a price back then.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I guess it wasn't just my work… that burned away in the incinerator that day.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: My mind's garden I had been tending to burned down with it.
Taking a backward glance at our trails... all of us have been suffering great losses.
Failing to see... what needed to be seen.
Allow me to apologize. For casting only slantwise glances.
We were all falling into ruin all the same, and you were no different... I did not realize it then.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: ...I wonder, do you think the cow is peacefully grazing grass somewhere right now?
I'm sure of it. He'll be waiting for you, even if you won't go back.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I don't think... it'll recognize me...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I've changed too much from who I was in the past.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Yeah, you're right. All the trophies and awards on my desk praising my excellence are empty husks.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Although they dazzle gloriously... they're empty inside. They're husks I couldn't have ever gotten if I weren't a member of the League.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: That's why I liked photographs. They... contain my image in all its honesty.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: For however long, when I look up at the sky... I can't see a thing. It's like I'm under a giant shadow...
Who is... Mr. Dongrang talking to...?
<This time... It doesn't seem to be me.>
I... might know what is about to transpire.
That man is heading toward distortion...
Certainly, and the distortion... might not be the terminus, but rather a step in a process.
Then... I-Is there any way we can help...
To stop him from going astray in this space where mental images take physical form.
As we do, he will naturally come to accept that what lies ahead is his path.
That is how we can help him.
